intro: Meibomia psilacra, commonly known as the slender meibomia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes many ornamental and medicinal plants. The plant features opposite, simple leaves that are usually elliptical in shape. Its small, tubular flowers are typically white or pale pink, and it produces small, red berries as fruit. Meibomia psilacra is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as forests or along stream banks.
